======== Petals, Flowers, & Home

Petals Flowers & Home

Located at 1267 Main Street Jackson Ky 41339

Contact us:

Meet Renee!

Renee Roberts is the wife of Lloyd "Jean" Roberts, Jr. She has one son and four grandchildren. She is a very caring woman who has a great sense of taste. She originally ran the store, Repeat Boutique, which burned down this past year. However, she healed her home and they were able to recover. Now, she runs Petals, Flowers, and Home. Her son, Lloyd, and his wife, Ladonna, run Studio 6 Salon, which is right next door to the flower shop.

Meet Tracy & Becky!

  • Tracy, a retired cosmotologist, is Renee's sister. The pair are known to scheme up some great flower designs. Tracy is a resident of Campton, KY, and loves spending time with her family.
  • Becky, a close friend of the family, is a do-it-all woman! She is great with designs and communication. Go on down and see Becky, you'll leave with something you never knew you needed! Every now and then, you can catch Turner's Produce set up outside at Petals!
Phone: 606-666-2018
Address: 1267 Main Street Jackson, KY 41339
